PRIMUS AUDITING OPERATIONS AUDIT
SERVICES AGREEMENT
div.p: Please sign and return this services agreement within 24 hours of receipt. JS Audit Group, Inc., dba Primus Auditing Operations (“Primus Auditing Ops”) is not responsible for changes to estimated costs or any additional costs incurred when Service Agreements are returned late. All estimates are calculated in U.S. dollars.

b.i: Services to be delivered by Primus Auditing Operations

div.p:
Estimated Travel Expenses: - Travel expenses are estimated and are subject to change based on actual travel expenses incurred.
Travel expenses are on a direct reimbursement basis and include all expenses for transportation, accommodation and meals. Whenever possible trips are combined with other business and expenses are divided to reduce the total cost for all of our customers.
1. DELIVERY. Note that audit reports and certificates are sent electronically via email. Hardcopies are available.
2. DATA OWNERSHIP. Customer acknowledges and agrees all data submitted by Primus Auditing Ops into the Primus Auditing Ops database and/or Azzule Systems database becomes the sole and exclusive property of Azzule Systems (“Azzule”). Azzule may use Customer's data to create anonymized data sets. Data sets are not associated with any individual Customer. Azzule shall not share personal or identifiable information with other third parties without Customer's consent. Azzule reserves the right to use data for use in preparing analytics, specific statistical comparisons, generic use in reports, presentations and other materials.
3. IDEMNIFICATION & HOLD HARMLESS. Customer acknowledges and agrees it shall indemnify, defend and hold Primus Auditing Ops and Azzule Systems harmless from all claims, demands, losses, liabilities, costs, expenses, obligations and damages of every kind and nature, known and unknown, including reasonable legal fees associated with Customer's commodity and operations, irrespective of the cause or nature of the liability.
4. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY. Customer hereby releases Primus Auditing Ops, Azzule Systems, their respective affiliates including but not limited to employees, officers, directors, shareholders, from any loss or liability suffered by Customer, as defined below, resulting from services performed under this Agreement. Such release shall include any actual, incidental, consequential or other damages beyond amounts paid to Primus Auditing Ops for auditing performed and/or facilitated by Primus Auditing Ops. Customer further acknowledges and agrees that Primus Auditing Ops' liability is limited only to audit work performed by it, and the parties expressly acknowledge that Primus Auditing Ops is not liable for Customer's commodity, its safety, or quality.
5. GOVERNING LAW / VENUE. This Agreement shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of California. In the event that it is necessary to institute any action to enforce any right granted herein or to redress any alleged breach hereof, then the exclusive venue for such action shall reside with the applicable Superior or Municipal Court located in Santa Maria, California.

6. GOVERNING AGENCY COMPLIANCE. Customer expressly acknowledges that Primus Auditing Ops and its auditors are not a governing agency, and does not set the industry standards for safety or protocol. Customer also acknowledges that Primus Auditing Ops. provides results of audits and makes no representation or warranty regarding the quality of the Customer's products, facility, fields, methods, or other audited subjects, or whether it complies with regulation standards.
7. RIGHT TO REFERRAL. Customer acknowledges that Primus Auditing Ops is, or may, contract out the auditing services performed for Customer. Because an independent auditor is engaged in his/her own independent contracting business and is not an employee of Primus Auditing Ops, Primus Auditing Ops will not obtain insurance (professional liability, workers' compensation, general liability, auto, etc.) for the auditor or his/her employees. Independent auditors agree by a separate referral agreement to obtain his/her own insurance coverage and furnish a copy of the certificate of insurance to Primus Auditing Ops. Furthermore, in those instances in which an independent auditor is retained, Primus Auditing Ops will be acting in the sole capacity of independent contractor and any information or data received will be merely transmitted between parties, making no independent judgment, representations or warranties as to the facts, observations or inferences made relative to the same.
8. TERM AND TERMINATION. This Agreement shall be good valid throughout the duration of Customer's Certification, and shall end at the time of the Certification's expiration. Provided that the representations and warranties, and ongoing obligations shall continue beyond the termination of this Agreement.
Termination for Cause. If either party fails to fulfill any term or condition of this Agreement, such failure shall constitute a breach of this Agreement by that party. The breaching Party shall have 10 calendar days from the time of receipt of written notice of such breach, to cure such breach. If after 10 days, the breaching party has not cured the breach, the non-breaching party may termination this agreement with no further obligations.
Voluntary Termination. Either party may voluntarily terminate this agreement upon fifteen days' written notice to the other party. If this Agreement is terminated by Customer, any certification granted by Primus Auditing Ops to Customer shall terminate immediately.
Termination by Customer After Desktop Review Portion of Audit. If Customer voluntarily terminated this Agreement in accordance with Section 8.b. above, but after Primus Auditing Ops has begun the desktop review portion of the audit, Customer acknowledges and agrees that it shall be responsible for, and shall pay to Primus Auditing Ops, an amount equal to ONE-THIRD (1/3) of the Audit Fee indicated in the “Audit Fee/Total Services” box on page 1 of this Agreement. Failure on Customer's behalf to do so is a material breach of this Agreement by Customer.
9. BILLING. The Customer agrees to pay Primus Auditing Ops within 30 days of billing.
